name: Debitos GmbH
goal: Debitos is a financial technology company and Europe´s leading secondary online marketplace for debt-and real estate sales. Through its auction-based online transaction platform banks, corporates and funds can sell their financial products (loans, Claims & real estates) to specialized investors.
interests: Banking and financial services, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, European Neighbourhood Policy, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: The employees of the ECB, EBA and the european commission have published a paper for an Europe-wide trading platform for bad bank loans. Debitos is the only technology provider in Europe that is already offering today almost every demanded functionalities.
